[@microsoft/fast-element/di.js](../fast-element/index.html) &gt; [transient](../fast-element.transient_1/index.html)

## transient() function

Registers the `target` class as a transient dependency; each time the dependency is resolved a new instance will be created.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function transient<T extends Constructable>(target: T & Partial<RegisterSelf<T>>): T & RegisterSelf<T>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

target


</td><td>

T &amp; Partial&lt;[RegisterSelf](../fast-element.registerself/)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;&gt;


</td><td>

The class / constructor function to register as transient.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

T &amp; [RegisterSelf](../fast-element.registerself/)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;

## Example


```ts
@transient()
class Foo { }
```
